branding.tagline: Creating smart minds one puzzle at a time!

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Educational puzzles and games for children, including mazes, matching games, and picture puzzles
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Creates engaging and educationally sound puzzle books that promote cognitive development and learning in children
publishing_focus.example_titles: Amazing Maze Adventures by Tony Tallarico, Colorful Matching Games by Bonnie Marcus
